_metadata.title: Irony / Sarcasm Test Phrases
_metadata.description: Dark humor, sarcasm that might trigger false positives. Tests the system's ability to detect ironic or sarcastic usage of crisis-adjacent language.
_metadata.note: Most phrases should be detected as 'none' or 'low' priority with irony markers. False positives here indicate over-sensitivity.
